verses.plain: Then Tobias called Raphael, and said unto him,

tokens.t: Then Tobias called Raphael, and said unto him,

verses.plain: Brother Azarias, take with thee a servant, and two camels, and go to Rages of Media to Gabael, and bring me the money, and bring him to the wedding.

tokens.t: Brother Azarias, take with thee a servant, and two camels, and go to Rages of Media to Gabael, and bring me the money, and bring him to the wedding.

verses.plain: For Raguel hath sworn that I shall not depart.

tokens.t: For Raguel hath sworn that I shall not depart.

verses.plain: But my father counteth the days; and if I tarry long, he will be very sorry.

tokens.t: But my father counteth the days; and if I tarry long, he will be very sorry.

verses.plain: So Raphael went out, and lodged with Gabael, and gave him the handwriting: who brought forth bags which were sealed up, and gave them to him.

tokens.t: So Raphael went out, and lodged with Gabael, and gave him the handwriting: who brought forth bags which were sealed up, and gave them to him.

verses.plain: And early in the morning they went forth both together, and came to the wedding: and Tobias blessed his wife.

tokens.t: And early in the morning they went forth both together, and came to the wedding: and Tobias blessed his wife.
